item.description: NC Triangle Steppers Presents Steppin N2 Fall (3rd Anniversary Set) October 1 thru 3, 2010 www.nctrianglesteppers.com Anniversary Steppers set DVD on sale go to www.nctrianglesteppers.com to purchase Check out the promo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qK989avLhaE Private Lessons Offered by LC Henderson, Brian "Steppin B" Patterson, Otis Jefferson Workshops Larry Collins (Steady Steppers-Detroit) Ultimate Couples Workshop Friday, October 1, 2010 - 7:00 to 8:45pm $20 at the door ONLY Otis Jefferson (Strictly Steppers-Chicago) Advanced Beginners/Intermediate Saturday October 2, 2010 - 12:00 to 1:45 pm $20 adv, $25 atd This class is not for beginner's you must know your basic steps, turns and beat of Chicago Style Steppin. The Class will be separated into your particular skill level, so come prepared to enhance your dance. Brian "Steppin B" Patterson (Chicago/Los Angeles) Advanced Saturday October 2, 2010 - 2:00 to 3:45 pm $20 adv, $25 atd You must be comfortable with all advanced turns such as: Extended right, Roll out roll back, double turns and triples. This class will be fasted-paced and not for beginners. LC Henderson (Chicago) Train the Trainer Saturday October 2, 2010 - 4:00 to 5:45pm $20 at the door ONLY If you are teaching/assisting and want to tighten up your teaching skills, learn a new technique to teach, this workshop is for you. This workshop is NOT for beginners...Intermediate and advanced ONLY

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Road Trip - NC Triangle Steppers 3rd Anniversary Set - Oct 1 - 3
